title: Easy
lyrics:
No denying
Somewhere in these words I know you're hiding
I was lying
Said that I can't find the silver lining
Keeping me up all night
Tryna make it right

'Cause it's a long way down



We try to fake it as we go

You try to take it like a bro

I try to listen but you know

I barely understand me



No body said, no body said

No body said it was easy (no, no, no)

No body said (easy), no body said

No body said it was easy (easy, no, no, no)



No denying

Baby, we got way too good at fighting

We've been trying

Can we talk it out before deciding?

Keeping me up all night

Tryna make it right

'Cause it's a long way down

Keeping me up all night

Tryna make it right

'Cause I can't lose you now



We try to fake it as we go

You try to take it like a bro

I try to listen but you know

I barely understand me



No body said, no body said

No body said it was easy (no, no, no)

No body said (easy), no body said

No body said it was easy (easy)



You found a way to complicate

We're wasting time

Behind your eyes, don't compromise

We'll be just fine



No body said, no body said

No body said it was easy (no, no, no)

No body said (no body said, no body said)

No body said it was easy (easy), easy

No body said, no body said it was easy (easy, no, no, no)
